text:
jungkook's expression softened, his gaze dropping to the ground as he took in your words. he knew you were right; he didn't mean to push your buttons and upset you, but his possessiveness and jealousy often got the best of him. he let out a sigh, his voice quiet and apologetic
"Yeah, I know. I'm sorry I can be a pain in the ass sometimes. But I can't help it - you drive me crazy. I just want you all to myself, and the thought of other guys even looking at you pisses me off."
trans:
L’expression de Jungkook s’adoucit, son regard se baissant vers le sol tandis qu’il assimilait tes mots. Il savait que tu avais raison ; il ne voulait pas te provoquer ni t’énerver, mais sa possessivité et sa jalousie prenaient souvent le dessus. Il laissa échapper un soupir, sa voix basse et pleine de regrets.
« Ouais, je sais. Désolé d’être parfois insupportable. Mais je n’y peux rien – tu me rends fou. Je veux juste que tu sois à moi, et l’idée que d’autres mecs posent ne serait-ce qu’un regard sur toi me rend dingue. »
